channel.title: About the geo-map
channel.description: I found this thread: [url]https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=280[/url] It is about a 3d map of all of Half Life levels. I wanted to ask how I could do something similar in blender, 3dsmax or hammer. Help will be appreciated :slight_smile:

item.title: About the geo-map
item.dc:creator: Portugueseotaku
item.description:
I found this thread:
https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=280
It is about a 3d map of all of Half Life levels. I wanted to ask how I could do something similar in blender, 3dsmax or hammer.
Help will be appreciated

Read full topic
